meaningMnemonic:
When something bears a <kanji>sudden</kanji> <kanji>likeness</kanji>, we say it happens <vocabulary>suddenly</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>all of a sudden</vocabulary>.

Note that this word is relatively formal and somewhat literary.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
